message: Cloudflare免費為公民團體提供DDoS防護
story: Peter Chung shared a link to the group: g0v.tw 後勤中心.
description: The Internet is a powerful tool for spreading and expanding ideas. However, websites can be knocked offline easily through a distributed denial of service (DDoS) attack—censoring important voices. Public interest websites that cover political or artistic content are often the target of these attacks…
name: Project Galileo | CloudFlare | The web performance & security company
caption: cloudflare.com
